select a.* from TB_PRODUCT_COUPON a left join TB_COUPON_QUOTA_RULE b on a.UUID = b.COUPON_ID and IFNULL(b.IS_ENABLE, '1') = '1' where if(length(a.IS_ENABLE),a.IS_ENABLE,'1') = '1'
and (if(length(a.APPLY_PRODUCT_FLAG),a.APPLY_PRODUCT_FLAG,'0') = '1' or EXISTS (select 1 from TB_COUPON_REF_PRODUCT b where b.COUPON_ID=a.UUID and b.PRODUCT_ID=#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
and (if(length(a.ENTRUST_WAY_SET),a.ENTRUST_WAY_SET,'*') = '*' or instr(ENTRUST_WAY_SET, #{entrustWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0)
and ( if(length(a.CLIENT_TYPE_SET),a.CLIENT_TYPE_SET,'*') = '*' or instr(CLIENT_TYPE_SET, #{clientType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0)
and a.ALLOW_GET_BEGIN_DATE <= sysdate() and a.ALLOW_GET_END_DATE >= sysdate() and (ifnull(b.PER_DATE_MAX_AMOUNT,999999999)>=999999999 or b.PER_DATE_MAX_AMOUNT > (select sum(ifnull(d.COUPON_AMOUT, 0)) from TB_CLIENT_COUPON d where ifnull(d.IS_ENABLE, '1') = '1' and d.COUPON_ID = a.UUID and (d.STATUS in ('1', '2') or curdate() <= d.VALID_END_DATE) and d.CREATE_TIME >= curdate())) and (ifnull(b.MAX_AMOUNT,999999999)>=999999999 or b.MAX_AMOUNT > (select sum(ifnull(d.COUPON_AMOUT, 0)) from TB_CLIENT_COUPON d where ifnull(d.IS_ENABLE, '1') = '1' and d.COUPON_ID = a.UUID and (d.STATUS in ('1', '2') or curdate() <= d.VALID_END_DATE))) and (ifnull(b.MAX_COUNT,999999999)>=999999999 or b.MAX_COUNT > (select count(ifnull(d.UUID, 0)) from TB_CLIENT_COUPON d where ifnull(d.IS_ENABLE, '1') = '1' and d.COUPON_ID = a.UUID and (d.STATUS in ('1', '2') or curdate() <= d.VALID_END_DATE))) Order by a.CREATE_TIME desc

and a.ALLOW_USE_BEGIN_DATE <=curdate() and a.ALLOW_USE_END_DATE >=curdate()
and a.ALLOW_USE_END_DATE <curdate()
and a.COUPON_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{commonQry.couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

and a.GET_STAGE='3'
and instr(a.CLIENT_TYPE_SET,'11')>0
and COUPON_TYPE ='0'
and COUPON_TYPE ='1'
and COUPON_TYPE in ('2','3')
and ALLOW_GET_BEGIN_DATE >curdate()
and ALLOW_GET_BEGIN_DATE <=curdate() and a.ALLOW_GET_END_DATE >=curdate()
and ALLOW_GET_END_DATE <curdate()
Order by a.CREATE_TIME desc

and ( if(length(a.CLIENT_TYPE_SET),a.CLIENT_TYPE_SET,'*')='*' or (instr(a.CLIENT_TYPE_SET,'10') >0 and instr(a.CLIENT_TYPE_SET,'11')>0 )) and if(length(a.GET_STAGE),a.GET_STAGE,'6')!='3'
and a.GET_STAGE='3'
and instr(a.CLIENT_TYPE_SET,'11')>0
and COUPON_TYPE ='0'
and COUPON_TYPE ='1'
and COUPON_TYPE in ('2','3')
and ALLOW_GET_BEGIN_DATE >curdate()
and ALLOW_GET_BEGIN_DATE <=curdate() and a.ALLOW_GET_END_DATE >=curdate()
and ALLOW_GET_END_DATE <curdate()
group by case when a.CLIENT_TYPE_SET = '11' then '2' when ifnull(a.GET_STAGE, '6') = '3' then '1' else '0' end
